languages.text: {n}Склонившись над {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}грудой останков{/d}, Джай складывает руки в молитвенном жесте и крепко сцепляет аквилу побелевшими пальцами. Робкий, неразборчивый шепот доносится из-за ширмы смоляных волос.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Склонившись над грудой останков, Джай складывает руки в молитвенном жесте и крепко сцепляет аквилу побелевшими пальцами. Робкий, неразборчивый шепот доносится из-за ширмы смоляных волос.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bowing over the {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}pile of bodies{/d}, Jae brings her hands together in a praying gesture and then tightly grips the Aquila, her fingers turning white. A small, unintelligible murmur comes from behind the curtain of her jet-black hair.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Склонившись над {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}грудой останков{/d}, Джай складывает руки в молитвенном жесте и крепко сцепляет аквилу побелевшими пальцами. Робкий, неразборчивый шепот доносится из-за ширмы смоляных волос.{/n}

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}遺体の山{/d}に頭を下げ、祈るような姿勢で両手を合わせると、指が白くなるほど強くアクィラを握った。彼女の漆黒の髪のカーテンの向こうから、聞き取れないほど小さなつぶやきが聞こえる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Bowing over the {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}pile of bodies{/d}, Jae brings her hands together in a praying gesture and then tightly grips the Aquila, her fingers turning white. A small, unintelligible murmur comes from behind the curtain of her jet-black hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}遺体の山{/d}に頭を下げ、祈るような姿勢で両手を合わせると、指が白くなるほど強くアクィラを握った。彼女の漆黒の髪のカーテンの向こうから、聞き取れないほど小さなつぶやきが聞こえる。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊在{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}尸堆{/d}面前鞠了个躬，双手合十，做出了祈祷的姿势。她紧紧地握着双头鹰坠饰，双手捏得发白。从她漆黑的发帘后面，传来了一阵细微的、难以听清的呢喃。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Bowing over the {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}pile of bodies{/d}, Jae brings her hands together in a praying gesture and then tightly grips the Aquila, her fingers turning white. A small, unintelligible murmur comes from behind the curtain of her jet-black hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊在尸堆面前鞠了个躬，双手合十，做出了祈祷的姿势。她紧紧地握着双头鹰坠饰，双手捏得发白。从她漆黑的发帘后面，传来了一阵细微的、难以听清的呢喃。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tras inclinarse ante un {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}montón de cadáveres{/d}, Jae entrelaza las manos en un gesto de oración y agarra con fuerza el Aquila. Sus dedos se tornan blancos y un murmullo ininteligible surge tras la cortina que forma su cabellera negro azabache.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Bowing over the {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}pile of bodies{/d}, Jae brings her hands together in a praying gesture and then tightly grips the Aquila, her fingers turning white. A small, unintelligible murmur comes from behind the curtain of her jet-black hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras inclinarse ante un montón de cadáveres, Jae entrelaza las manos en un gesto de oración y agarra con fuerza el Aquila. Sus dedos se tornan blancos y un murmullo ininteligible surge tras la cortina que forma su cabellera negro azabache.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae s'incline face à la {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}pile de corps{/d} et joint les mains en un geste de prière. Elle saisit son Aquila et le serre si fort entre ses doigts que les articulations blanchissent. Un murmure inintelligible franchit le rideau formé par sa chevelure noir de jais.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Bowing over the {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}pile of bodies{/d}, Jae brings her hands together in a praying gesture and then tightly grips the Aquila, her fingers turning white. A small, unintelligible murmur comes from behind the curtain of her jet-black hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae s'incline face à la pile de corps et joint les mains en un geste de prière. Elle saisit son Aquila et le serre si fort entre ses doigts que les articulations blanchissent. Un murmure inintelligible franchit le rideau formé par sa chevelure noir de jais.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae beugt sich über den {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}Leichenhaufen{/d}, faltet in einer Gebetsgeste die Hände und umfasst dann ihren Adler so fest, dass die Fingerknöchel weiß werden. Hinter dem Vorhang ihres tiefschwarzen Haars ertönt ein leises, unverständliches Murmeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Bowing over the {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}pile of bodies{/d}, Jae brings her hands together in a praying gesture and then tightly grips the Aquila, her fingers turning white. A small, unintelligible murmur comes from behind the curtain of her jet-black hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae beugt sich über den Leichenhaufen, faltet in einer Gebetsgeste die Hände und umfasst dann ihren Adler so fest, dass die Fingerknöchel weiß werden. Hinter dem Vorhang ihres tiefschwarzen Haars ertönt ein leises, unverständliches Murmeln.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}Ceset yığını{/d} üzerine eğilip ellerini dua edercesine kavuşturan Jae, Çift Başlı Kartal'ı parmaklarında kan kalmayıncaya dek sıkarcasına kavrıyor. Yüzüne düşmüş kuzgun karası saçlarının ardından hafif, anlaşılmaz mırıltılar duyuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Bowing over the {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}pile of bodies{/d}, Jae brings her hands together in a praying gesture and then tightly grips the Aquila, her fingers turning white. A small, unintelligible murmur comes from behind the curtain of her jet-black hair.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, {d|Encyclopedia:JaeQ2_BreakingThrough}ceset yığını{/d} üzerinde eğilip ellerini dua edercesine kavuşturuyor ve Çift Başlı Kartal'ını sıkıca, parmaklarında kan kalmayıncaya kadar kavrıyor. Yüzüne düşmüş kuzgun karası saçlarının ardından hafif, anlaşılmaz mırıltılar duyuluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
